channel.title: Altar
channel.description:
I need to know a simple code to restore your pray to what level it is. I have come up with this:
[code] NewPrayer = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]);[/code]
Would that work if I added it in a case?

item.title: Altar
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

This works, as I use it;

case 61: case 409: case 8749: case 13198: if (playerLevel[5] < getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) { setSkillLevel(5, getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), playerXP[5]); playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]); setAnimation(645); sendMsg("You recharge your prayer points."); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMsg("You already have full prayer points."); } break;

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
